creator: hal@symphoniq.com
text:
Apache did not invoke registered output filters, in cases of http responses 
with 404 (Not Found) status code. The problem can be reproduced using Apache 
2.0.53 on Windows and Linux. Looks like it is an Apache bug? Please advise.

creator: chip@force-elite.com
text:
Error replies take a different path, and output filters for the main request are
not set.  I think we could document this better?

creator: chip@force-elite.com
text: No reply, but they need to use the error output filters.
